amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws that are necessary to protect the health and safety of those, including children and discouraged workers, who, through no fault of their own, receive welfare assistance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of two amendments, offered en bloc, to exempt from the provisions of the bill those laws and regulations that are necessary to protect the health and safety of those, including children and discouraged workers, who, through no fault of their own, receive welfare assistance. Text of the amendments were printed as amendment Nos. 40 and 42 in the Congressional Record of January 19, 1995.

action.text: On agreeing to the Clay amendments (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 284 (Roll no. 64).
